article:
'Nucleus' is a British-European advocacy group, based in London, but with
additional operations in Brussels.

Founded in 2010, Nucleus promotes a 'euro-realist' British approach to European
political and business affairs. As well as regular bulletins, Nucleus produces
commentaries, and hosts briefings, seminars, and networking events both in
London and Brussels.

Nucleus is a partner in both the British Brussels Network, along with Business
for New Europe, the British Chamber of Commerce in Belgium, and the Institute of
Chartered Accountants in England and
Wales, http://www.britishbrusselsnetwork.eu/about/ and the pan-
European EuropAssociation. http://europassociation.com/about-ea/
categories: Foreign relations of the United Kingdom
Political pressure groups of the United Kingdom
